description: Modo is primarily used by professional 3D designers for creating various types of models and environments. Some examples include product package designs, shoes, room designs, video game characters, film effects, and building structures.
Presets allow users to save often-used components that can be inserted into different projects. This enables users to save time on repetitive tasks.
You can create an LXE file by selecting File â†’ Save Environment Preset... , or right-click a material layer in the "Shading" tab in the right panel and select Save Environment Preset .
NOTE: Foundry Modo was formerly known as Luxology Modo before Luxology merged with Foundry.
